title: Evaluation of alternatives bases to TMAH tissue extraction of ENMs from tissues prior to spICP-MS analysis
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00416G, Paper
Bahareh Sadeghalvad, Evan Patrick Gray
Engineered nanomaterials (ENMs) are used in various consumer and industrial products, including human and biological systems for diagnostic and therapeutic purposes. Evaluating the size or number of ENMs contained within...
